_text: What you see here are projects I've done or been a part of. Amongst them this website.
Feel free to explore. I can't say I've not hidden small surprises.

_description: I finally made this website and it turned out quite OK.
_text: What you see before your very eyes is my own design, made from scratch.

I can't say that this is perfect design nor perfectly made. However, I actually did it! I can barely believe it. All these times I've made shitty websites and now this: The best of the shitty websites!
How did I do it then?
I had to start somewhere so I actually started with the smallest piece, this Card.

_description: Extremely long description which hopefully doesn't look so ugly. I mean, after all it is just a description. But about what? I don't know. It is, however, extremely long!

_title: Extremely Long Title Which Will Look Ugly

_text: This is the backside of the last card.
So there's a picture of me.
Now, would you kindly look into my eyes and stare into my soul.
